TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l i z k ɔ l d s t e f t s t e l ɐ a k s oʊ t ʊ b ɹ ɪ ŋ ɡ d ɪ s t ɪ ŋ ɡ z ɪ f ɚ f ɹ ɔ m d e s t ɔ s ɪ k s s p uː n z ʌ f ɹ ɛ s s n ʊ p i z f aɪ v t i k s l a b z ʌ v b l ʊ tʃ i æ n d m eɪ b i e s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ oʊ d ɐ b ɔ b w i ɔ l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔ l p l a s t i k s n eɪ æ n d ɐ b i k t oɪ f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɔ d ə k i s s i k ɛ n s p ʊ d i s t ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ t ɹ i ɹ ɛ d b a ɡ z æ n d i ɾ ɡ o m i t ə w ɛ n s d eɪ ɐ d ɾ t ɹ eɪ ŋ s t eɪ ʃ ə n

SNAKE NOCONTEXT: sni

BAGS INCONTEXT: baɡz
